title: 3 and Out - Tiger, Brady/Dolphins Reports, Jets/DK Trade Buzz, WR Value Boom, Pre-Draft Perspective, Flores Suit
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Tiger, Brady/Dolphins Reports, Jets/DK Trade Buzz, WR Value Boom, Pre-Draft Perspective, Flores Suit
description:
John gives quick thoughts on Tiger's resilient Masters 1st round, and if pain and fatigue will be a factor if he makes it to the weekend. Then, he reacts to Tom Brady reportedly almost joining the Dolphins as a minority owner, explains why the Jets shouldn't trade for DK Metcalf, why the wide receiver boom isn't going away anytime soon, and how NFL teams make worse evaluations of prospects the further into the pre-draft process, and thoughts on Steve Wilks joining the Flores discrimination lawsuit against the NFL.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
